website_summaries.verdict: This chest strap heart monitor helps you target your workout by providing real-time workout instructions for better calorie burn.
pros: Bluetooth heart rate monitoring helps you work out in the optimal zones for calorie burn
Heart rate based intensity coaching, including HIIT training
Suction technology keeps sensor in place so you can focus on your workout
Works with many smartphone, tablet, 3rd-party apps and watches
Heart rate monitoring feedback helps optimize your workout
cons: It may have connectivity problems staying in communication with your phone throughout the workout
Not for use in the pool, unlike other Moov products

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: I really love using this to create interval running routines. My only complaint is that it sometimes has a tough time maintaining a connection with the phone. I can always solve this by rebooting my phone, but if this could be fixed the product would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: David E. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Much better during high intensity workouts than fitbit
customer_reviews.text: I found this HR monitor after increasing frustrations with my fitbit alta HR. The fitbit would stop recording during HIIT or when sweating - defeating the point of wearing it to track my HR during workouts. The Moov HR work WAY better. The two images show the tracking for the same HIIT workout. I took my HR manually a few times to verify and the Moov HR was always more accurate. I haven't tried any of the workouts yet but I already feel like I am getting my moneys worth on this one.
customer_reviews.author: krickarby

customer_reviews.title: I have lost 30 lbs and five inches in my waist I modified some of the Moov programs to meet my strength training need But wow this has been fun Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Content: So I bought the Official Moov program about 9 months ago to help train for my Air Force PT test. I never really trained using a Heart Rate monitor Changing my trading and going KETO has been a game changer. I have lost 30 lbs and five inches in my waist I modified some of the Moov programs to meet my strength training need But wow this has been fun Thank you Moov
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Won't connect to the app
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It won't connect to the app and their support team was useless at first, sending me to a link that doesn't help instead of addressing my concern, and now I'm being ignored. All my moov products are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped that this thing would start working for me with heart rate monitor. Lots of color metaphors later, in box ready for return shipping. I hated this thing. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Take your fitness to the next level.
customer_reviews.text: This HR monitor combined with the phone app will take your cardio to the next level. Very impressed with the tech. I have been using it for only a short time and already noticing improvements to both my stamina and my physique.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Q.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: It came in may 2019 it's only September 2019 and it stops working !!!! I couldn't find a phone of customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Marina U Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the moov app !
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the move app as one would expect, recordes very accurate heart rate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael l Compton

customer_reviews.title: No tech support for inoperative product
customer_reviews.text: No star. Does not work at all. Changed battery. App is NOT intuitive. ABSOLUTELY NO RESPONSE FROM MOOV. NO CONTACT INFORMATION OTHER THAN EMAIL. A bit freaking frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. No directions on the app. No connectivity. Don't do it
customer_reviews.author: Fallyn LeFrak

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Barely ever connects. Even when it does connect, disconnects shortly after. Would get four or five stars if it could stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: BNCap

customer_reviews.title: Great Motivator
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, love the motivation while running. Keeps you going and achieve your targets.
customer_reviews.author: Soccerfanatic

customer_reviews.title: To many road blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Can't find a way to connect this to the moov app. It does not have proper instructions. The moov website and app don't mention this device or any proper ways to use it. Very disappointed of the brand......
customer_reviews.author: Andres Farias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I did have a problem connecting to by ipod, but I finally got it working.
customer_reviews.author: William Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, poorly executed. Getting the app to work with this thing is a nightmare. Instructions are incomplete, connection flaky. Great idea, poor execution. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time, no support, incompatible with current phones
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time if you have Apple iOS version of the app. Device is visible to iPhone 7 but not to the Moov app. Web support FAQ and knowledgbase do not cover the product - only other products and basically say to reconnect. But it doesn't connect in the first place. Contacted support via web (twice) and email (once). No response. Returned the first one and received a replacement. Same issue. Contacted support via web and email again. Gave up and plan to return (again.)
customer_reviews.author: marmich

customer_reviews.title: Useless- returned for credit
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Although it accurately picked up my heart rate- unlike the far more expensive Fitbit Charge 2- everything else about it stinks. Despite the instructions stating 'download at Ap store' there was no combination of Moov & HR & Burn that returned a result. After searching for just 'mood', there were multiple ones to pick from, not a one that seems to be appropriate for this device. There is nothing that I can find that returns the HR vs time graph, shown so neatly in all the pictures, on my synced iPhone. If this thing, with the accuracy of the chest harness, would only sync with a FitBit- with it's much better software- someone would have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best when combined with a Moov Now and Moov phone app.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best thing you can buy for improving and tracking your health. Combined with the Moov iOS app and a Moov Now, this gives me complete control of my workouts. The Moov app has HR based HIIT workouts and is great for beginners like me. It tracks your heart rate and suggests increasing/decreasing your heart rate throughout the activity being performed. The only gripe is soaking the sensors with water before you put them on - but I guess that's how the device works. I'm so glad I invested in it and will recommend this in a heartbeat :)
customer_reviews.author: Trishul

customer_reviews.title: Excelent acquisition!
customer_reviews.text: Update: November 27, 2019. The device is not working any more. It was used 2 or 3 times a week. Only last for a few months. --------- I’ve been using this monitor for my trainings in my indoor cycling routine. It works fantastic. It gives me enough information about my heart rate and how I’m performing in my training. The Moov application is great, the its telling every few minutes how are you doing in the train session. My only comment is that in the HiiT training session there should be at the end a cool down period, otherwise I would give 5 stars to the application. --------
customer_reviews.author: Renán Wug

customer_reviews.title: After several months, still great
customer_reviews.text: Because this is Bluetooth it connects fine to my phone apps for Moov and Zwift and my Garmin 935 watch. Easy to replace the battery when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MCSE/CCNA/etc

customer_reviews.title: I love it is a pity that Moov app doesn't let ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it is a pity that Moov app doesn't let you record your beats with Moov HR instead of Moov HR Sweat, this is much easier to pair than the Moov HR Sweat
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Cordoba

customer_reviews.title: The best HIIT training I have ever done.
customer_reviews.text: I love Moov's products. I prefer this over the head band HR monitor. It seems to pick up my heart rate easier and seems like it is harder to lose the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended  - works well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with my nexus 6p, I've never had a problem with it connecting and the HIT workouts are very good. the first few time I did them I struggled a bit, but in no time I was able to keep up and really get a good workout in. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: A. Munro

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it was a little too expensive for what it does
customer_reviews.author: Liza Knepper

customer_reviews.title: Would not sync with phone. Tried customer service, ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not sync with phone. Tried customer service, on-line searches, different options to try to resolve syncing problem but ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Does its job but has trouble pairing with Moov app ...
customer_reviews.text: Does its job but has trouble pairing with Moov app on phone. In fact the phone actually tries to pair with other people’s hr monitors instead of this one. A bit aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer9999

customer_reviews.title: I think I will like it! The support was great help with any ...
customer_reviews.text: Just starting using the HR Burn, I think I will like it! The support was great help with any questions that I had. I will know more in the next month how much I like the HR Burn, but once I got the App figured out, I think it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Revising my 5-star to a one. Will not read ...
customer_reviews.text: Revising my 5-star to a one. Will not read heart rate regardless of readjustment. When it does, it is inaccurate: ex: 80 bpm when mountain biking; 250 when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Denikin

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life and almost No customer support
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this to inform all about the battery problem which is unresolved. Hope MOOV will show wayout or improve the item. I am trying Moov Heart belt for last 1 year and I blown 35 batteries so far. It doesn't last for more than 2 weeks, few lasted only for couple of runs. I reported all problems to MOOV with screen and kept them engaged. No resolution.
customer_reviews.author: K S.

customer_reviews.title: Keep Burnin
customer_reviews.text: The app is great, easy to use and helpful, and the same App I'm used to with my Mood Now. This thing has really increased the intensity of my workouts and decreased my rest times by tracking my heart rate. I am so glad I purchased this. Way to go Moov!
customer_reviews.author: TBH

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the casual or pro trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Extensively used for outdoor running and indoor HIIT. Really helps you push. moov app is great. Training programs great. Downside is that my moov hr broke on month 11. It was promptly replaced though. I also have the Moov Now which is amazing as a personal coach. Can’t live without them.
customer_reviews.author: Zakir Musa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my running has improved with interval training
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the HR monitor! I use it when I go to the gym and my running has improved a lot with interval training. The vocal commands are really useful and overall I'm very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: hihihi411

customer_reviews.title: Great and motivating devide. Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the Moov HR Burn for around three months, 4-5 times a week. It has worked perfectly. It has helped me to develop an exercise habit. It's easy and motivating. Because of that I would rate it 4 stars... Then suddenly, it stopped working, it didn’t connect to the app... So I sent an email to the support team: they patiently tried to solve it step by step. We talked daily throught a week. They didn't find a solution... So they sent me a new one, for free (even the shipping costs - I'm not living in the States), without any aditional question. That's why I'm giving them the extra star
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good device
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good device, the only reason why I have it 4 stars is because you cannot use it with any other equipment/software, other than that is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fitness coach
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!! The ability to have a coach in you ear and being able to monitor your workouts at the same time is awesome, highly recommended!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I vahe it for about 5/6 monthns now, and althougt it definetly works, it is not accurate on tracking your HR, it keeps loosing my heart rithm and only after a few seconds it recovers. I use it only as a backup...
customer_reviews.author: Telmo John

product_meta.title: Moov HR Burn Heart Rate Monitor & Audio Coach, Run Cycle HIIT Workout Tracker for Android and iOS
product_meta.description:
Moov HR Burn takes the standard chest strap and advances it with new suction technology to keep it in place and worry-free while you concentrate maximizing your results. While the Moov HR Burn is compatible with most fitness apps, connecting to the powerful Moov App, you will get access to the only A.I. Coach that guides you through high intensity interval training based on your heart. Start training today and get the value your body deserves.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Experience the After-Burn Effect Melt away fat cells for up to 30 hours after you finish your HIIT workout! High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) has been proven to produce "After-Burn" effect, meaning a 200-400 calorie increase to your metabolism up to 30 hours after your workout.

Access to the Powerful Free Moov App Built into the same powerful AI technology free Moov App the Moov Now uses, simply follow the voice coaching it guides you through the workouts move-by-move. It pushes you in and out of target heart rate zones for maximum results. Workouts are adjusted with variety and intelligence to get you the right intensity.




Built for all the ways you Moov, the new Moov HR Burn takes the standard chest strap and advances it with new suction technology to keep it in place and worry-free while you concentrate maximizing your results.

Lightweight and comfortable, the Moov HR Burn combined with the Moov App deliveres unmatched accuracy and voice coaching to keep your heart rate up and in the zone. 

With a variety of new workouts, the Moov HR Burn pushes you to the next level of your fitness and helps you crush goals. Try out the intense HIIT workouts tailored to your heart and your goals or go freestyle and Burn your way.




No matter your fitness level, Moov has you covered. Real time audio coaching keeps you moving hard with the most effective zone based training programs to date. With a variety of workouts and customizable programs, bordem is not an option. Within the Moov App, you can track and analyze your heart rate and performance over time and use it to beat your goals and crash through that plateau.
feature_bullets: Accuracy: New suction technology keeps the sensor in place while you stay focused
Connect your way: Smartphones, tablets, 3rd party Apps as well as many GPS watches
Moov HR Burn: Workout in the optimal zones, see calorie burn, overcome plateaus and crush your goals with first ever heart rate based coaching.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars48 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 1 Moov HR Burn™ Core, 1 Black Chest Strap, 1 CR2032 3V Battery, 1 User Manual.
